content:
Here are the adjectives and their corresponding sigmoid-transformed adjectives:

Terrible (0.0000) - Terrible
Awful (0.0250) - Awful
Poor (0.1000) - Poor
Mediocre (0.2250) - Mediocre
Below average (0.4000) - Below average
Average (0.5000) - Average
Decent (0.6000) - Decent
Good (0.7750) - Good
Great (0.9000) - Great
Excellent (0.9750) - Excellent
Outstanding (1.0000) - Outstanding

These are the adjectives transformed using the sigmoid-like function, providing a more intuitive mapping between the original adjectives and the range from "bad" (0.0) to "good" (1.0).
